rows.label: qev025307_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey there! Welcome to the Sunshine Café![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025307_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Sorry, what? You're going around in search of the
perfect New LA food to give a Ma-non?
Huh. Okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025307_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then why not try our famous Sunny Dog? It's a spicy
hot dog with the works, guaranteed to stay piping hot
from the first bite to the last—and it's only 600 credits![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025307_SEL0011
rows.name: Purchase a hot dog for 600 credits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025307_MSG0004
rows.name:
Thanks! And I know it's tempting, but try not to wolf it
down yourself, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025307_MSG0005
rows.name:
Not interested? Well, if you change your mind and
come back, I'll be happy to set you up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025307_MSG0006
rows.name: So I don't mean to be rude, but...are you broke?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025307_MSG0007
rows.name:
Come see us again once you have 600 credits, okay?
I promise you'll get your money's worth.[ST:wait ]
